articles.description: Here are the eight nerdiest things that happened in free agency, according to front office insider John Hollinger.
articles.content: LAS VEGAS Summer league is here and, in a rarity, were actually talking mostly about summer league while it happens. Free agency is basically over for all the leagues significant players, unless they… [+18003 chars]
